name: 6a_semana_js_expert(erick-wendel)
description: Seja bem vindo(a) à sexta Semana Javascript Expert. Este é o código inicial para iniciar nossa jornada.

scripts.test: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --runInBand --no-cache
scripts.test:watch: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --runInBand --no-cache --watchAll
scripts.test:coverage: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --runInBand --no-cache --coverage tests/unit
